statements: SELECT * FROM third_party_services;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM third_party_services;
SELECT service_name, api_endpoints FROM third_party_services WHERE service_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services WHERE service_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT service_name FROM third_party_services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services WHERE service_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM third_party_services WHERE service_name LIKE '%API%';
SELECT * FROM third_party_services ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT service_id, service_name, api_endpoints FROM third_party_services WHERE service_id > 2 AND service_name NOT LIKE '%dev%';
SELECT * FROM third_party_services WHERE service_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY service_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_apps;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM cloud_apps WHERE app_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM third_party_services WHERE api_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT app_name, third_party_service_id FROM cloud_apps ORDER BY app_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services WHERE service_description ILIKE '%secure%';
SELECT * FROM cloud_apps WHERE app_name = 'Example App';
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM cloud_apps WHERE app_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT app_id, app_name, third_party_service_id FROM cloud_apps WHERE third_party_service_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM cloud_apps WHERE app_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND app_name = 'Example App';
SELECT app_id, app_name, service_name FROM cloud_apps JOIN third_party_services ON cloud_apps.third_party_service_id = third_party_services.service_id;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM third_party_services ORDER BY service_type DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM cloud_applications WHERE app_version = '1.0';
SELECT app_name, service_name, integration_method, api_endpoint FROM app_service_mapping WHERE app_name = 'MyApp';
SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS total_applications FROM app_service_mapping GROUP BY service_name;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services WHERE service_type = 'Payment';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM third_party_services WHERE service_type = 'Authentication' ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_version, app_description FROM cloud_applications WHERE app_version = 'v1.0' AND app_name LIKE '%Management%';
SELECT app_name, service_name, integration_method FROM app_service_mapping WHERE integration_method = 'Webhook' ORDER BY app_name ASC, service_name DESC;
SELECT app_name, service_name, api_endpoint FROM app_service_mapping WHERE api_endpoint IS NOT NULL AND service_name LIKE '%Analytics%' ORDER BY app_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services;
SELECT service_name, api_endpoint FROM third_party_services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS total_usage FROM third_party_services JOIN service_usage ON third_party_services.service_id = service_usage.service_id GROUP BY service_name;
SELECT app_name, app_owner FROM cloud_applications WHERE app_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM integration_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services;
SELECT service_name, api_endpoint FROM third_party_services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_description, app_owner FROM cloud_applications WHERE app_owner = 'John Doe';

SELECT log_id, service_name, app_name, log_message, log_timestamp FROM integration_logs INNER JOIN third_party_services ON integration_logs.service_id = third_party_services.service_id INNER JOIN cloud_applications ON integration_logs.app_id = cloud_applications.app_id ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;

SELECT service_name, SUM(usage_count) AS total_usage FROM third_party_services INNER JOIN service_usage ON third_party_services.service_id = service_usage.service_id GROUP BY service_name HAVING total_usage > 1000 ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, api_key FROM third_party_services WHERE service_id = 3;
SELECT endpoint_url, endpoint_description FROM api_endpoints WHERE api_key_required = TRUE;
SELECT app_name, app_owner FROM cloud_applications WHERE app_type = 'SaaS';
SELECT * FROM integration_logs WHERE integration_status = 'FAILED' ORDER BY integration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_services WHERE service_name = 'Analytics Service';
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM third_party_services ORDER BY service_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_applications WHERE app_type IN ('Web App', 'Mobile App') AND app_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT endpoint_id, endpoint_url, endpoint_description FROM api_endpoints WHERE api_key_required = TRUE;
SELECT log_id, integration_date, integration_status, error_message FROM integration_logs WHERE integration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY integration_date DESC;
